Description: Fragment of Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Flattened handle, curving. Rectangular stamp. Clay near fine red-brown; mixed inclusions; cream slip.
Curator's comments: Petrie drew three such stamps (Petrie diary, 1884-1885 (EES Archive XVII 47), p..27a 13, 71 3 and 96 5).
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.1610)
